decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted 11th September and labelled Isometric drawing, and location plan with scale 1:500, submitted 12th September 2017 and labelled Location plan with scale 1:1250, and location plan with scale 1:500 (including outline of proposal), and submitted 23rd October 2017 and labelled Elevations and floor plan, therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes ancillary to the residential use of the dwelling known as 33 Park Road, Hounslow, TW3 2EX.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding in the rear garden of the house
